entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
